actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the period from May 15 through May 22, 1976, as National Car Care Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the period from May 16 through May 22, 1976, as "National Car Care Week" to focus public attention on the personal and public benefits of properly maintained automobiles.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the period from May 15 through May 22, 1976, as National Car Care Week.
